title: 如何编写插件?
author: qq867648970
txt_content: 求教，本人有一定的c 和 java基础。

replies.author: HC20011015
replies.txt_content:
其实编写插件不会很难,因为本人Java和Minecraft在为你打基础;
擅用Char和运算符优先级

replies.author: qq867648970
replies.txt_content:

擅用Char和运算符优先级 ...

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: HotFlow
replies.txt_content:
哪个端的插件？bukkit端和Cauldron端的是extends JavaPlugin，BungeeCord 是 extends Plugin
thread closed

replies.txt_content:

thread closed ...
extend javaplugin

replies.author: zero28
replies.txt_content: 先理解游戏运行的基本机制，想个简单的插件例如自定义前缀，然后实现。然后基本都会了，想干嘛干嘛

replies.author: HotFlow
replies.txt_content:

哪个端的插件？bukkit端和Cauldron端的是extends JavaPlugin，BungeeCord 是 extends Plugin
thread closed ...
你extends JavaPlugin之后就会做了 如果你有java 和 c 的基础

replies.author: xycxor
replies.txt_content: 感觉比较麻烦，首先要昨天尝试做一个hellowolrd提示找不到主类，不知道是不是我用mcpc的的缘故，头的大了，jdk用的是1.8 64x，求指教
